long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Be more productive while working in your Gmail inbox. 

This extension allows you to lookup your BriteBiz Contacts from your Gmail inbox. 
 - View a BriteBiz Contact profile
 - View a Contact's active Inquiries
 - View a Contact's upcoming Bookings   
 - Create a new BriteBiz Contact
 - Create a new BriteBiz Inquiry

Requirements:
 - You must have a BriteBiz account to use this extension
 - Open Gmail in your browser to active the extension
